definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: kinsman (on father's side) (Ar. 9am=un paternal uncle, etc., v. I. [[עמם]]; cf. perh. TelAm. ammu, kinsmen (?); on Nab. [[עם]] ancestor cf. Lzb:151, 499; v. also esp. Nes:Eg 187, ZAW xvi (1896), 322f. Krenkel:ib. viii (1888), 280–84);—sf. [[עַמִּי]] in [[בֶּן־עַמִּי]] (q. v.), and n. pr. sqq.; elsewhere pl. sf. [[עַמֶּיְ]] Nu 27:13, Nu 31:2 (Le 19:16 read [[עַמְְּ]] LXX Sam), + (poss.) [[עֲמָמֶיְ]] Ju Jdg 5:14; [[עַמָּיו]] Ge 25:8 + 15 t., [[עַמֶּיהָ]] Ge 17:14 + 3 t.; read [[עַמֶּי]] (for MT [[עַמִּי]], I. [[עַם]]; cf. Krenkel:l. c. 281) Ge 49:29 and perh. Ju Jdg 14:3 (cf. Le 21:14); acc. to Buhl Kit also 2Ki 4:13; —father's kinsmen: [[וַיֵּאָסֵף אֶל־עַמָּיו]] Ge 25:8 (of joining kinsmen in Shₑ’ôl), so v:Ge 25:17, Ge 35:29, Ge 49:33, Nu 20:24, De 32:50, cf. Ge 49:29 (v. supr.), Nu 27:13, Nu 31:2, De 32:50 (all P); [[וְנִכְרְתָה הַנֶּפֶשׁ מֵעַמֶּיהָ]] Ge 17:4 (severed from living kinsmen), so Le 7:20, Le 7:21, Le 7:23, Le 7:27, Le 19:8, Le 23:29, Nu 9:13, [[מִקֶּרֶב עַמֶּיהָ]] Ex 31:14, cf. Ex 30:33, Ex 30:38, Le 17:9 (all PH); [[מֵעַמָּיו יִקַּח אִשָּׁה]] Le 21:14 (H), and perh. Ju Jdg 14:3 (sim. I. [[עַם]]: [[[ם]]—[[ָ]], [[הּ]]—[[ָ]]] [[מִקֶּרֶב עַמּוֹ]] Le 17:4, Le 17:10, Le 18:29 +); other combin. Ju Jdg 5:14 (si vera l. read perh. [[בְּעַמְֶָּ]], v. I. [[עַם]]

definitions.title: 2 d
definitions.body: ), Le 21:1, Le 21:4, Le 21:15 (H), Ez Eze 18:18 and (perh.) 2Ki 4:13.—[[בֶּן־עַמִּי]] (v. p. 122 b) perh. = son of my kinsman; on n.pr. c. [[עַם]] v. Gray:Prop. N. 41 ff.
